skillTree.name: Inspiring Inferno
skillTree.description: Feel the fire, then live it.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Infernal units
	(own army)

skillTree.name: Infernal Deathmask
skillTree.description: The leaders of the Infernal Guard are clearly identifiable from their lavishly-decorated suits of armour …and the deafening roar of their voices when giving orders.

skillTree.name: Hashut's Scales
skillTree.description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.

skillTree.name: Headdress of Zharr
skillTree.description: Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Bandolier
skillTree.description: Professional soldiery means never running out of ammo at the crucial moment.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Restock
skillTree.description: Arrows, cannonballs and more esoteric munitions are needed in endless supply on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Infernal Slugs
skillTree.description: These are no ordinary bullets, for they have been forged in Hashut's roiling, molten fires, will go further and explode on contact.

effects.description: "Explosive Bullets" ammunition (projectiles will cause explosive damage)

skillTree.name: War Mattock
skillTree.description: Engineering ingenuity extended to mining and excavation implements can also prove useful to a battlefield skirmisher.

skillTree.name: Blast Protection
skillTree.description: The blackshard armour they wear protects the Infernal Castellan from much of the hurly-burly of battle, such as the worst effects of sizeable explosions.

skillTree.name: In Your Face
skillTree.description: At the forefront of the battle, covered in blood and gods only know what else, shooting, slashing and stabbing the foe to a screaming death – *that's* where you'll find this one.

skillTree.name: Hellforged Bolts
skillTree.description: The Fire-Dwarfs' armouries are powered by a thousand immensely hot furnaces, from which all of their manufactured munitions are produced.

skillTree.name: Stabilised Bipod
skillTree.description: With so little rattle and recoil, a firearm can be kept stable enough to fire with greater accuracy from much further away.

skillTree.name: Skirmish Tactics
skillTree.description: Some loudly state their view that killing from a distance, and other "sneaky" tactics, are unvalorous and unbefitting of a warrior, but they're wrong, for it is an art.

skillTree.name: Cinderblast Shell
skillTree.description: "Stand Back! These are Dawr, but this is only the milluzth attempt!"

skillTree.name: Molten Cores
skillTree.description: As the hellforged bolts strike their target, their molten cores seep out, melting their defences and leaving them prone.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Callous
backgroundSkills.description: To say that this one is insensitive and cold-hearted would be a massive understatement, such is his unfeeling nature.

backgroundSkills.name: Materialistic
backgroundSkills.description: "What's mine is mine. What's yours is mine too."

backgroundSkills.name: Resentful
backgroundSkills.description: Unresolved past issues almost always lead to repercussions in the future. Oft-times, such things can be fatal…

backgroundSkills.name: Unethical
backgroundSkills.description: Time spent at the Black Fortress does something to the already questionable character of a Chaos Dwarf…

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Infernal Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Infernal Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Vindictive
backgroundSkills.description: He wouldn't let it lie. This one would, on the other hand, make it die. Watch out for him.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target

backgroundSkills.name: Volatile
backgroundSkills.description: "Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but soon I shall unleash my fury upon you…"

backgroundSkills.name: Cowardly
backgroundSkills.description: There are those who live for battle and risk death at every turn. Not so, this one, who is more than apprehensive when faced with the fray.

backgroundSkills.name: Envious
backgroundSkills.description: Whatever you've got is what this one wants, and the more enchanted, the better.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%

backgroundSkills.name: Greedy
backgroundSkills.description: Kill them all and keep the loot for yourself. It's not a negative quality to be acquisitive as, after all, it's a material world, no?

backgroundSkills.name: Boastful
backgroundSkills.description: You'd think he was the only one ever to have achieved something, the way he goes on about every little victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Hated
backgroundSkills.description: No one likes him, but he really couldn't care less. He has an extremely thick skin, figuratively and literally, it seems.

backgroundSkills.name: Hubristic
backgroundSkills.description: Pride is supposed to come before a fall, but thus far, this one has not lived up to that proverb.

backgroundSkills.name: Phlegmatic
backgroundSkills.description: Stoic and calm, this one is never anything less than totally in control.

backgroundSkills.name: Apathetic
backgroundSkills.description: "Do we have to? Urgh, how tedious…"

backgroundSkills.name: Cruel
backgroundSkills.description: The lives of others mean nothing to this abject psycho, and neither does their property. If it's not nailed down, or even if it is, it's fair game to him.
